thread.title: How Microsoft will report Xbox numbers going forward
thread.title_full: How Microsoft will report Xbox numbers going forward

title: How Microsoft will report Xbox numbers going forward
text:
How Microsoft will report Xbox numbers going forward 
Cnet Saturday 24th October, 2015 
Xbox One shipment number. As it turns out, this was by design. GameSpot has been informed that Microsoft will focus more on Xbox Live usership figures instead of console shipment numbers going forward....
